## Health Facilities Map

```{r} 
library(sf) 
library(leaflet)
library(shiny)
library(dplyr)

# Example: load pre processed sf object

hf_sf <- readRDS("../data/tanzania/hf_demographic_sf.rds")

leaflet(hf_sf) |>
 addTiles() |> 
 addCircleMarkers( radius = 3, stroke = FALSE, fillOpacity = 0.7 ) 

```

## Overview {#overview}

This section gives a general summary of health facilities in Tanzania.  
You can include charts, stats, or key messages here.

## Demographics {#demographics}

Here you display facility-level demographic info, e.g., number of beds, staff, population served, etc.

## Services {#services}

Details of available services per facility, e.g., outpatient, malaria, maternal health, HIV services.
